o2FindingsScriptLibrary.script: from O2Finding finding in o2Findings select new {finding.vulnType , finding.vulnName, finding.confidence, finding.severity, finding.o2Traces, finding }
from O2Finding finding in o2Findings select new {finding.vulnType, finding.vulnName , finding}
from O2Finding finding in o2Findings select finding
from O2Finding finding in o2Findings where finding.o2Traces.Count() ==1 select finding
from O2Finding finding in o2Findings where finding.o2Traces.Count() == 0 select finding
from O2Finding finding in o2Findings where finding.confidence == 1 select finding
from O2Finding finding in o2Findings where finding.confidence == 2 select finding
from O2Finding finding in o2Findings where finding.confidence == 3 select finding
from O2Finding finding in o2Findings where finding.severity == 0 select finding
from O2Finding finding in o2Findings where finding.severity == 1 select finding
from O2Finding finding in o2Findings where finding.severity == 2 select finding
from O2Finding finding in o2Findings where finding.severity == 3 select finding
from O2Finding finding in o2Findings select finding.vulnName
from O2Finding finding in o2Findings select finding.vulnType
from O2Finding finding in o2Findings where finding.Source != '' orderby finding.Source select finding.Source
from O2Finding finding in o2Findings where finding.Sink != '' orderby finding.Sink select finding.Sink
from O2Finding finding in o2Findings where finding.LostSink != '' orderby finding.LostSink select finding.LostSink
from O2Finding finding in o2Findings where finding.KnownSink != '' orderby finding.KnownSink select finding.KnownSink

script.title: Number of Findings on each Unique VulnName

o2FindingsScriptLibrary.script: from f in o2Findings orderby f.vulnName descending group f by f.vulnName into g select new { vulnName = g.Key, number_of_calls = g.Count()}

script.title: Number of Findings on each Unique VulnType

o2FindingsScriptLibrary.script: from f in o2Findings orderby f.vulnType ascending group f by f.vulnType into g select new { vulnName = g.Key, number_of_calls = g.Count()}
